projects.title: CharityHub
projects.description: This website is a non-profit centralized database that provides a straight-forward and accessible way for common people to find charities catered to their interests or relevant to their situations. Team class project for CSCI 3308: Software Dev Methods & Tools.

projects.title: Nonogram Solver
projects.description: A script that can solve any Nonogram puzzle on puzzle-nonograms.com, with thorough documentation on how to use it on GitHub. Independent project.

projects.title: CU Campus Navigation
projects.description: A program that helps the user navigate through and find the optimal path between two points in CU Boulder's campus. Independent class project for CSCI 2275: Programming and Data Structures.
